mapper.sql: id, org, per_name, per_tel, per_addr, addr, code, cont_name, cont_tel, status, start, end
mapper.select: SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end FROM t_pack WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end FROM t_pack WHERE per_tel IN ( SELECT phone FROM t_user WHERE card = #{card} )
SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end FROM t_pack WHERE status = 0 AND per_tel IN ( SELECT phone FROM t_user WHERE card = #{card} )

SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end FROM t_pack WHERE (status = 1 OR status = -1) AND per_tel IN ( SELECT phone FROM t_user WHERE card = #{card} )
SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end FROM t_pack WHERE addr IN ( SELECT addr FROM t_admin WHERE card = #{card} )
SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end FROM t_pack WHERE status = 0 AND addr IN ( SELECT addr FROM t_admin WHERE card = #{card} )

SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end FROM t_pack WHERE (status = 1 OR status = -1) AND addr IN ( SELECT addr FROM t_admin WHERE card = #{card} )
